lead_paragraph: TWO vast battles are being fought today on two vast oceans. High drama and swift action mark the Battle of the Pacific: grinding monotony, punctuated by sharp thrusts of undersea and surface ships, makes the Battle of the Atlantic a grim endurance contest. The maps furnish a backdrop for understanding the strategy of the conflicts.
